document_data.name: Firward Mountains
document_data.mainbody: The '''Firward Mountains''' was a small mountain range found in the nation of [[Narfell]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dIc}}
document_data.Geography: The mountain range sat in southeastern Narfell just north of the shores of [[Lake Ashane]], wedged in between the larger [[Dunwood]] to the west and the smaller [[Erech Forest]] to the east. The collection of small lakes known as the [[Teardrops]] sat to the north of the Firward Mountains, and [[Helena Gap]] separated the mountains from the fringes of the Dunwood.
